subject: Order #SSN2592
description_text:
Hallo,

I have 1x Simsonn Pro Pedals and Pro Plus Pedals Upgrade Kit

     1x Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for 
Vibration Feedback
Plus X Pedal Control Box

both articles SF6045904574195 <https://www.sf-express.com/we/ow/chn/en/waybill/waybill-detail/SF6045904574195>,that *didn't arrive*

and the VAM that has arrived 1x Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the 
Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback VAM Pro Set (2 pac/includes 
power supply)

articles SF6045904574229 <https://www.sf-express.com/we/ow/chn/en/waybill/waybill-detail/SF6045904574229> is arrived

Additionally, I paid 29.95€ (9 days) for express shipping and 
unfortunately can't use the item as a gift. What do you suggest? Oliver 
Jakobi

conversations.body_text: Hi Oliver Jakobi,      We regret to inform you that your parcel was collected by the courier but has not been dispatched. Following investigation, it appears the parcel has been lost. We shall arrange for an immediate replacement and refund the additional postage you paid.
